QuestData.Title: Monstrous Energy
QuestData.Description: Have you ever heard about eel juice? I don't know if it's safe for $rs like you, but tortollans love it! It gives us a burst of energy, and puts a spring in the step of even the oldest tortollan.$b$bI saw some eels to the north of the estate when we were traveling. Can you go collect some of their venom for my dad?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Pulsating Extract from Venomscale Slitherers in Rockskip Falls.
QuestData.CompletionText: My dad will be so excited when he sees his favorite drink!
QuestData.RewardText: Oh boy oh boy! He's gonna be pumped!
